Package meka.experiment.evaluationstatistics

Interface FileBasedEvaluationStatisticsHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EvaluationStatisticsHandler, FileFormatSupporter, LogSupporter, weka.core.OptionHandler, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFileBasedEvaluationStatisticsHandler, KeyValuePairs, Serialized

    public interface FileBasedEvaluationStatisticsHandler
extends EvaluationStatisticsHandler, FileFormatSupporter
    Interface for file-based statistics handlers.
